features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: Powerful tools for healthier digital habits
features.intro: Tawazn is your digital wellness companion designed to help you find balance in a world filled with distractions. Rooted in Islamic principles, our app intelligently manages your screen time while encouraging spiritual growth and meaningful connections. Whether you're looking to reduce social media usage, focus during whatsapp times, or build healthier digital habits, Tawazn provides the tools and motivation you need to reclaim your time and live with intention.

cards.desc: See exactly where your time goes with beautiful charts. Track daily, weekly, monthly progress.
